autoFocus.description: Whether to focus the first focusable element by default only takes effect when focusLock is enabled.
autoFocus.description_zh: 是否默认聚焦第一个可聚焦元素，只在 focusLock 开启时生效。

closable.description: Whether or not to display the close button in the upper right corner
closable.description_zh: 是否显示右上角关闭按钮

confirmLoading.description: Check whether the button is loading
confirmLoading.description_zh: 确认按钮是否为加载中状态

escToExit.description: Press the ESC key to close

focusLock.description: Whether to lock focus within a pop-up box.
focusLock.description_zh: 是否将焦点锁定在弹出框内。

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

maskClosable.description: Click to see if the mask can be turned off
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否可以关闭

mountOnEnter.description: Whether the DOM is rendered when the dialog is first opened.
mountOnEnter.description_zh: 是否在初次打开对话框时才渲染 dom。

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure while hidden
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏的时候销毁 DOM 结构

:visible.description: Whether or not to display a pop-up box

:zIndex.description: Set the zIndex of the drawer

placement.description: Drawer orientation top right bottom left
placement.description_zh: 抽屉的方向 top right bottom left

:closeIcon.description: Customize the close button in the upper right corner
:closeIcon.description_zh: 自定义右上角关闭按钮

:footer.description: Custom button confirmation and cancel buttons, if null, there is no button group
:footer.description_zh: 自定义按钮确认和取消按钮，为 null 的话没有按钮组

title.description: Title of the popup box (when set to null, the title bar is not displayed)
title.description_zh: 弹出框的标题（设置为 null 时，不显示标题栏）

:bodyStyle.description: The style of the content area

:cancelButtonProps.description: Cancel the props of the button

height.description: The height of the drawer, which takes effect when the placement is top bottom
height.description_zh: 抽屉的高度，placement为 top bottom 时生效

:maskStyle.description: Sets the style of the mask layer

okButtonProps.description: Confirm the props of the button

width.description: The width of the drawer, which takes effect when the placement is left right
width.description_zh: 抽屉的宽度，placement为 left right 时生效

wrapClassName.description: Set the class name of the outer container

:afterClose.description: Callback after the drawer is closed

:afterOpen.description: Callback after the drawer is opened

:getChildrenPopupContainer.description: The pop-up box in the drawer, such as Select Tooltip, is mounted in the dialog box by default.
:getChildrenPopupContainer.description_zh: 抽屉里的弹出框 Select Tooltip 等挂载的容器，默认挂载在对话框内。

:getPopupContainer.description: Specify the parent node to which the pop-up box is mounted
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 指定弹出框挂载的父节点

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Close the callback for the pop-up box

events.name: onOk
events.description: Click the callback of the Confirm button
